verses.verse: A Psalm of Asaph. The Mighty<WH410> One<WH430>, God, Jehovah<WH3068>, hath spoken<WH1696>, And called<WH7121> the earth<WH776> from the rising<WH4217> of the sun<WH8121> unto the going down thereof<WH3996>.
Out of Zion<WH6726>, the perfection<WH4359> of beauty<WH3308>, God<WH430> hath shined forth<WH3313>.
Our God<WH430> cometh<WH935>, and doth not keep silence<WH2790>: A fire<WH784> devoureth<WH398> before<WH6440> him<WH3966>, And it is very tempestuous<WH8175> round about him<WH5439>.
He calleth<WH7121> to the heavens<WH8064> above<WH5920>, And to the earth<WH776>, that he may judge<WH1777> his people<WH5971>:
Gather <WH622> my saints<WH2623> together unto me<WH3772>, Those that have made a covenant<WH1285> with me by sacrifice<WH2077>.
And the heavens<WH8064> shall declare<WH5046> his righteousness<WH6664>; For God<WH430> is judge<WH8199> himself<WH5542>. [[Selah
Hear <WH8085>, O my people<WH5971>, and I will speak<WH1696>; O Israel<WH3478>, and I will testify<WH5749> unto thee<WH430>: I am God, even thy God<WH430>.
I will not reprove<WH3198> thee for thy sacrifices<WH2077>; And thy burnt-offerings<WH5930> are continually before me<WH8548>.
I will take<WH3947> no bullock<WH6499> out of thy house<WH1004>, Nor he-goats<WH6260> out of thy folds<WH4356>.
For every beast<WH2416> of the forest<WH3293> is mine<WH929>, And the cattle upon a thousand<WH505> hills<WH2042>.
I know<WH3045> all the birds<WH5775> of the mountains<WH2022>; And the wild beasts<WH2123> of the field<WH7704> are mine<WH5978>.
If I were hungry<WH7456>, I would not tell<WH559> thee<WH8398>; For the world is mine<WH4393>, and the fulness thereof.
Will I eat<WH398> the flesh<WH1320> of bulls<WH47>, Or drink<WH8354> the blood<WH1818> of goats<WH6260>?
Offer <WH2076> unto God<WH430> the sacrifice of thanksgiving<WH8426>; And pay<WH7999> thy vows<WH5088> unto the Most High<WH5945>:
And call<WH7121> upon me in the day<WH3117> of trouble<WH6869>; I will deliver<WH2502> thee<WH3513>, and thou shalt glorify me.
But unto the wicked<WH7563> God<WH430> saith<WH559>, What hast thou to do to declare<WH5608> my statutes<WH2706>, And that thou hast taken<WH5375> my covenant<WH1285> in thy mouth<WH6310>,
Seeing thou hatest<WH8130> instruction<WH4148>, And castest<WH7993> my words<WH1697> behind thee<WH310>?
When thou sawest<WH7200> a thief<WH1590>, thou consentedst<WH7521> with him<WH2506>, And hast been partaker with adulterers<WH5003>.
Thou givest<WH7971> thy mouth<WH6310> to evil<WH7451>, And thy tongue<WH3956> frameth<WH6775> deceit<WH4820>.
Thou sittest<WH3427> and speakest<WH1696> against thy brother<WH251>; Thou<WH5414> slanderest<WH1848> thine own mother<WH517>'s son<WH1121>.

These things hast thou done<WH6213>, and I kept silence<WH2790>; Thou thoughtest<WH1819> that I was altogether<WH1961> such a one as thyself<WH3198>: But I will reprove thee<WH6186>, and set them in order before thine eyes<WH5869>.
Now consider<WH995> this<WH7911>, ye that forget God<WH433>, Lest I tear you in pieces<WH2963>, and there be none to deliver<WH5337>:
Whoso offereth<WH2076> the sacrifice of thanksgiving<WH8426> glorifieth<WH3513> me<WH7760>; And to him that ordereth his way<WH1870> aright Will I show<WH7200> the salvation<WH3468> of God<WH430>.
